name: Your Princess is in Another Castle!
name_original: Your Princess is in Another Castle!
description:
Your Princess is in Another Castle

The savior is here to rescue the princess!
But what if the princess doesn't want to be rescued?

In this dynamic stealth RPG adventure, you play as Princess Plum as you try to escape the castle the back way to avoid an unwanted suitor.

Play Time: 5-10 Minutes

Built in November 2022 and submitted to Game Off 2022

Programming work by:
Ryan Winstead (rwinstead.itch.io)
Josh Todd (pyralis.itch.io)

Original Artwork by:
Brandon Reed (star-drifter.itch.io)

Music by:
https://beepyeah.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-pack
https://tallbeard.itch.io/three-red-hearts-prepare-to-dev
